content: 原文地址 https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/1045674/Load-EXE-as-DLL-Mission-Possible 下载链接 https://www.codeproject.com/KB/winsdk/1045674/exeasdll.zip 有空再说吧.
title: Load EXE as DLL: Mission Possible

content: 注意事项 运行完.reg文件, 需要重新启动Windows 资源管理器才能看到效果.

content: 解除屏蔽"使用 Skype 共享"右键菜单
title: Skype右键菜单
uri: /posts/skype-right-click-context-menu/#解除屏蔽使用-skype-共享右键菜单

content: 解除屏蔽本机"使用 Skype 共享"右键菜单 skype_hklm_unblock.reg Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00 [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked] "{776DBC8D-7347-478C-8D71-791E12EF49D8}"=-
title: Skype右键菜单
uri: /posts/skype-right-click-context-menu/#解除屏蔽本机使用-skype-共享右键菜单

content: 解除屏蔽当前用户"使用 Skype 共享"右键菜单 skype_hkcu_unblock.reg Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00 [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked] "{776DBC8D-7347-478C-8D71-791E12EF49D8}"=-
title: Skype右键菜单
uri: /posts/skype-right-click-context-menu/#解除屏蔽当前用户使用-skype-共享右键菜单

content: 解除屏蔽后清理可能不包含键值的空项 skype_reg_clean.bat %1 mshta vbscript:CreateObject^("Shell.Application"^).ShellExecute^("cmd.exe","/C "^&chr^(34^)^&chr^(34^)^&"%~f0"^&chr^(34^)^&" REM"^&chr^(34^),"","runas",1^)^(window.close^) & GOTO :EOF PUSHD "%~dp0" REG QUERY "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked" && ((REG QUERY "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked" | FINDSTR REG_) || REG DELETE "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked" /f) REG QUERY "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked" && ((REG QUERY "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked" | FINDSTR REG_) || REG DELETE "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked" /f) POPD
title: Skype右键菜单

content: 安装静态网站生成器hugo-extended 官方教程 https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 创建或使用守望者仓库watcher_dnasdw https://github.com/new https://github.com/dnasdw/watcher_dnasdw
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 创建部署仓库dnasdw.github.io https://github.com/new https://github.com/dnasdw/dnasdw.github.io
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 创建评论仓库comments_dnasdw https://github.com/new https://github.com/dnasdw/comments_dnasdw
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 创建源文件仓库pages_dnasdw https://github.com/new https://github.com/dnasdw/pages_dnasdw 克隆到本地并新建站点 git clone --recursive https://github.com/dnasdw/pages_dnasdw.git hugo new site pages_dnasdw --force cd pages_dnasdw 创建.gitignore 内容来自https://github.com/github/gitignore/blob/main/community/Golang/Hugo.gitignore # Generated files by hugo /public/ /resources/_gen/ /assets/jsconfig.json hugo_stats.json # Executable may be added to repository hugo.exe hugo.darwin hugo.linux # Temporary lock file while building /.hugo_build.lock 添加主题 git submodule add https://github.com/dnasdw/DoIt.git themes/DoIt 修改config.toml baseURL = "https://dnasdw.github.io/" defaultContentLanguage = "zh-cn" theme = "DoIt" title = "巨好玩" [languages] [languages.zh-cn] languageCode = "zh-CN" hasCJKLanguage = true [params] version = "0.2.X" 提交推送 git add * git commit -m setup git push origin master
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 创建MY_GITHUB_TOKEN 查看是否已有token https://github.com/settings/tokens 如果没有则新建token https://github.com/settings/tokens/new 配置参考 Note: actions-gh-pages Expiration: No expiration Select scopes: [v] repo
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 把MY_GITHUB_TOKEN配置到守望者仓库中 查看是否已配置token https://github.com/dnasdw/watcher_dnasdw/settings/secrets/actions 如果没有则配置token https://github.com/dnasdw/watcher_dnasdw/settings/secrets/actions/new 配置参考 MY_GITHUB_TOKEN: ghp_*
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 配置守望者 克隆到本地 git clone --recursive https://github.com/dnasdw/watcher_dnasdw.git cd watcher_dnasdw git submodule add https://github.com/dnasdw/pages_dnasdw.git pages_dnasdw 创建github actions配置.github/workflows/dnasdw-gh-pages.yml 配置参考 https://github.com/dnasdw/public_reference/blob/master/YAML/.github/workflows/dnasdw-gh-pages.yml 提交推送 git add * git commit -m "setup pages" git push origin master
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 配置中转worker 教程 https://github.com/dnasdw/workflow_dispatch-worker 配置参考 GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET: 2008* Payload URL: https://webhook_workflow_dispatch-worker.dnasdw.workers.dev/api/github/repos/dnasdw/watcher_dnasdw/actions/workflows/dnasdw-gh-pages.yml/dispatches
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: github pages地址 配置地址 https://github.com/dnasdw/dnasdw.github.io/settings/pages 页面地址 https://dnasdw.github.io/
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 安装评论系统 https://utteranc.es/ 应用地址 https://github.com/apps/utterances 配置权限 Only select repositories: dnasdw/comments_dnasdw
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 更新config 配置参考 https://github.com/dnasdw/public_reference/blob/master/TOML/pages_dnasdw/config.toml
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 头像文件 创建assets/images/dnasdw256.png, 并将config中的头像路径改为/images/dnasdw256.png.
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 网站图标 准备一个512x512的图标, 比如去https://www.flaticon.com/搜索一个合适的. 去https://realfavicongenerator.net/上传图标, 下载得到图标配置包, 解压到static目录.
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 补充缺失的中文译文 创建i18n/zh-CN.toml # Translations for Simplified Chinese # 简体中文的翻译 # https://gohugo.io/content-management/multilingual/#translation-of-strings [authors] other = "作者"
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 作者配置 创建data/authors/dnasdw.toml name = "dnasdw" link = "https://github.com/dnasdw" 之后就可以在文章的Front Matter中使用authors: [dnasdw].
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 配置PWA 创建content/offline/index.md --- title: "离线" --- > 你没有连接至互联网, 只有缓存的页面可用. 修改static/site.webmanifest, 添加start_url, 并填写name/short_name/start_url. { "name": "巨好玩", "short_name": "巨好玩", "start_url": "/", "icons": [ { "src": "/android-chrome-192x192.png", "sizes": "192x192", "type": "image/png" }, { "src": "/android-chrome-512x512.png", "sizes": "512x512", "type": "image/png" } ], "theme_color": "#ffffff", "background_color": "#ffffff", "display": "standalone" }
title: 如何创建这个网站

content: 你没有连接至互联网, 只有缓存的页面可用.
title: 离线
